# Book Club Website - Development Instructions

## Design System & Visual Style

### Typography

- **Primary typeface**: Space Grotesk (Google Fonts) - geometric sans-serif inspired by Futura
- **Font weights**:
  - 300 (Light): Body text, supporting information
  - 400 (Regular): Standard body text
  - 500 (Medium): Subheadings, emphasis
  - 700 (Bold): Headlines, primary emphasis
- Implement clear typographic hierarchy with varied font weights
- Favor large, bold headings with geometric letterforms
- Use generous letter-spacing for headers, tighter for body text
- Import from Google Fonts: `https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Space Grotesk:wght@300;400;500;700&display=swap`

### Color Palette

#### Light Mode

- Neutrals: Light grey backgrounds (#E5E5E5, #F5F5F5), pure white (#FFFFFF), dark grey text (#1A1A1A)
- Accent: Pure geometric orange (#FF6600) for CTAs and highlights
- Text: Near-black (#1A1A1A) on light backgrounds

#### Dark Mode

- Neutrals: True black (#000000), dark grey (#1A1A1A, #2A2A2A), light grey text (#E5E5E5)
- Accent: Pure geometric orange (#FF6600) - maintains vibrancy in dark mode
- Text: Off-white (#E5E5E5, #F5F5F5) on dark backgrounds

#### General Color Guidelines

- Use bold color blocking - avoid gradients
- High contrast between text and backgrounds in both modes
- Orange accent should pop equally in light and dark themes

### Layout & Composition

- Grid-based layouts with strong alignment
- Generous negative space (white space) around all elements
- Clean geometric shapes (perfect circles, squares, rectangles)
- Asymmetric balance when appropriate
- Minimal decorative elements - let typography and geometry create visual interest

### Component Style

- Sharp, clean edges (minimal border-radius, use 0-4px max)
- Flat design - avoid shadows except for functional elevation
- Bold, clear interactive states
- Simple, purposeful animations (avoid playful or bouncy effects)
- Theme toggle should be prominent and accessible

## Technical Stack

### Frontend

- **Framework**: React 18+ with TypeScript
- **Routing**: React Router v6+ (SPA architecture)
- **UI Components**: ShadCN UI (accessible, themeable components)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS (utility-first approach)
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **Theme**: Light/Dark mode toggle with persistent preference
- **Typography**: Montserrat via Google Fonts

### Backend

- **Framework**: Hono on Cloudflare Workers
- **API Structure**: REST-like endpoints under `/api/*`
- **Features**: CORS support, middleware, edge deployment
- **Database**: Cloudflare D1 (SQLite-based edge database)

### Deployment

- Cloudflare Workers via Wrangler
- Vite plugin bundles frontend + backend together
- Global edge network distribution
- Database hosted on Cloudflare D1

## Code Style Guidelines

### React Components

- Use functional components with TypeScript
- Implement proper prop typing with interfaces
- Use ShadCN UI components as base, customize with Tailwind
- Keep components focused and single-responsibility
- Utilize ShadCN's built-in dark mode support

### Tailwind Usage

- Prioritize Tailwind utilities over custom CSS
- Use consistent spacing scale (4, 8, 12, 16, 24, 32, 48, 64px)
- Leverage Tailwind's typography plugin for body text
- Use dark mode classes (dark:) for theme-aware styling
- Configure Montserrat as default sans-serif font in `tailwind.config.js`

### Tailwind Configuration

```javascript
// tailwind.config.js
export default {
  theme: {
    extend: {
      fontFamily: {
        sans: ["Montserrat", "system-ui", "sans-serif"],
      },
      colors: {
        orange: {
          bauhaus: "#FF6600",
        },
      },
    },
  },
};
```

### Font Import

```html
<!-- In index.html -->
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com" />
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin />
<link
  href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat:wght@300;400;500;700&display=swap"
  rel="stylesheet"
/>
```

### Theme Implementation

- Use ShadCN's theme provider for light/dark mode
- Store theme preference in localStorage
- Implement theme toggle component in main navigation
- Ensure all components respect theme context
- Test contrast ratios in both modes

### API Development

- Define Hono routes cleanly in `/api/*` structure
- Use proper HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
- Implement error handling middleware
- Return consistent JSON response formats
- Handle database connections via Cloudflare D1 bindings

### Database (Cloudflare D1)

- Use D1 for all persistent data storage
- Write migrations for schema changes
- Use prepared statements for queries
- Handle database bindings in Hono context
- Implement proper error handling for database operations

### File Structure

```
/src
  /components     # Reusable React components
  /pages          # Route-level page components
  /lib            # Utilities and helpers
  /api            # Hono backend routes
  /styles         # Global styles (minimal)
/public           # Static assets
/migrations       # D1 database migrations
```

## Design Implementation Notes

- When creating cards or containers: use subtle borders, flat backgrounds, no heavy shadows
- Buttons: geometric, bold text (font-weight: 500 or 700), high contrast, orange (#FF6600) accent for primary actions
- Navigation: clean horizontal or vertical layouts, clear active states, include theme toggle
- Book covers: let them be visual anchors, frame them simply with geometric containers
- Forms: minimal styling, clear labels, geometric input fields
- Loading states: simple geometric animations (rotating squares, not spinners)
- Dark mode: maintain the same geometric boldness, ensure orange accent remains vibrant
- Theme toggle: use a simple icon (sun/moon) with clean geometric design
- Headings: Use font-weight 700, generous letter-spacing (tracking-wide or tracking-wider)
- Body text: Use font-weight 300 or 400, normal letter-spacing

## Accessibility

- Maintain WCAG AA contrast ratios in both light and dark modes
- Use ShadCN's built-in accessibility features
- Semantic HTML via proper component usage
- Keyboard navigation support
- Ensure theme toggle is keyboard accessible
- Ensure Montserrat font loads properly with fallback to system fonts

## Performance

- Leverage Vite's code splitting
- Optimize images (WebP format preferred)
- Lazy load route components
- Minimize bundle size - tree-shake unused ShadCN components
- Use D1's edge location for fast database queries
- Preconnect to Google Fonts for faster font loading

## Example Component Pattern

```typescript
import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"

interface BookCardProps {
  title: string;
  author: string;
  coverUrl: string;
  rating: number;
}

export function BookCard({ title, author, coverUrl, rating }: BookCardProps) {
  return (
    <div className="bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 p-0">
      <img src={coverUrl} alt={title} className="w-full aspect-[2/3] object-cover" />
      <div className="p-6 space-y-3">
        <h3 className="font-bold text-xl tracking-tight text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">
          {title}
        </h3>
        <p className="text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400 font-light">
          {author}
        </p>

        {/* Rating Display */}
        <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
          <div className="flex gap-1">
            {Array.from({ length: 5 }).map((_, i) => (
              <div
                key={i}
                className={`w-3 h-3 rounded-full ${
                  i < rating
                    ? 'bg-[#FF6600]'
                    : 'bg-neutral-300 dark:bg-neutral-700'
                }`}
              />
            ))}
          </div>
          <span className="text-sm font-medium text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400">
            {rating.toFixed(1)}
          </span>
        </div>

        <Button className="w-full bg-[#FF6600] hover:bg-[#E55A00] text-white font-medium">
          View Details
        </Button>
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}
```

## Example API with D1

```typescript
import { Hono } from "hono";

type Bindings = {
  DB: D1Database;
};

const app = new Hono<{ Bindings: Bindings }>();

app.get("/api/books", async (c) => {
  const { results } = await c.env.DB.prepare(
    "SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY created_at DESC"
  ).all();

  return c.json({ books: results });
});

export default app;
```

## Key Principles

1. **Rationality over decoration** - every element serves a purpose
2. **Geometry over ornamentation** - use shapes, not embellishments
3. **Hierarchy through scale and weight** - not color or decoration
4. **Generous space** - don't crowd the layout
5. **Bold, confident choices** - avoid timid or busy designs
6. **Theme consistency** - both light and dark modes maintain the same geometric modernist integrity
7. **Orange as the singular accent** - #FF6600 is the only color accent, use it deliberately
8. **Typography as design element** - Montserrat's geometric forms are part of the visual language
